title: Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet
text:
Related: Motor Sports Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet 
Oct 21 Formula One drivers' form sheet for Sunday's U.S. Grand Prix in Austin, round 16 of the 19 race championship (listed in current championship order, most recent races first): Number=race result, R=retired, DQ=disqualified, NS=did not start, NQ-did not qualify. 2015 / 2014 RU JP SG IT BE HU GB AT CA MC ES BH CN MY AU/AD BR US RU JP SG IT BE Lewis Hamilton 1 1 R 1 1 6 1 2 1 3 2 1 1 2 1 1 2 1 1 1 1 1 R Sebastian Vettel 2 3 1 2 12 1 3 4 5 2 3 5 3 1 3 8 5 7 8 3 2 6 5 Nico Rosberg R 2 4 17 2 8 2 1 2 1 1 3 2 3 2 14 1 2 2 2 R 2 2 Kimi Raikkonen 8 4 3 5 7 R 8 R 4 6 5 2 4 4 R 10 7 13 9 12 8 9 4 Valtteri Bottas 12 5 5 4 9 13 5 5 3 14 4 4 6 5 NS 3 10 5 3 6 11 4 3 Felipe Massa 4 17 R 3 6 12 4 3 6 15 6 10 5 6 4 2 3 4 11 7 5 3 13 Daniil Kvyat 5 13 6 10 4 2 6 12 9 4 10 9 R 9 NS R 11 15 14 11 14 11 9 Daniel Ricciardo 15 15 2 8 R 3 R 10 13 5 7 6 9 10 6 4 R 3 7 4 3 5 1 Sergio Perez 3 12 7 6 5 R 9 9 11 7 13 8 11 13 10 7 15 R 10 10 7 7 8 Romain Grosjean R 7 13 R 3 7 R R 10 12 8 7 7 11 R 13 17 11 17 15 13 16 R Nico Hulkenberg R 6 R 7 NS R 7 6 8 11 15 13 R 14 7 6 8 R 12 8 9 12 10 Max Verstappen 10 9 8 12 8 4 R 8 15 R 11 R 17 7 R - - - - - - - - - - - - - - NS 11 9 8 5 14 10 10 12 RU-Russia, JP-Japan, SG-Singapore, IT-Italy, BE-Belgium, HU-Hungary, GB-Britain, AT-Austria, CA-Canada, Monaco, ES-Spain, BH-Bahrain, CN-China, MY-Malaysia, AU-Australia, AD-Abu Dhabi, BR-Brazil, US-United States.
